name: Trash Story
description:
This is short kinetic novel about a simple guy named Andrew who knew no troubles until he found a strange box under his door.
This event will change his life forever.

You will go on a strange miserable journey with Andrew to uncover the secret of dung box. It's a real trash, with black humor and badass story!

Game features:
¥ Short duration. The game will end sooner than you'll get bored...

¥ Eccentric visual style and unforgettable voiceover!

¥ Black humor and very dirty jokes!

¥ Memes, Easter eggs and crazy ending!

¥ Easy achievements, for everyone who will read the story to the end!
